name: campfyr-monorepo
description: Campfyr - A real-time chat application with multi-tenant organizations, room-based chat, direct messaging, and video calling

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=client && npm run lint:fix --workspace=api
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=client && npm run test --workspace=api
